short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Tundra for everyday searches like “what’s the weather today?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets your search engine to Tundra. So you can sequester carbon emissions with every search and help cool the planet.

Tundra is an internet search engine with a focus on the environment and environmental protection.  The search tool is available at www.searchtundra.com. We provide the public with more refined environmental search results and general internet search access with a sustainability driven goal---to help cool the planet.

HOW IT WORKS
Every time you search using Tundra, we offset a kilogram of carbon dioxide. This might not seem like much, but with millions of searches being made every day, huge progress can be made! The best part is, using Tundra and Tundra Environmental is free! The money that we make from ads goes to a project certified through the BCarbon system to make carbon offset possible.
SEARCH ENVIRONMENTAL WITH FOCUS
You can narrow your search results to show more environmentally related information from the most relevant sources. With filters like EPA, News, Social, Legal, and more, you can quickly find the best information for your nature needs.

Webstore link: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tundra-search/lnpjgfjgmgchgildhadadelcbilpkgad?hl=en

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Website: https://searchtundra.com/
